StatisticsPkg
Class Statistics

java.lang.Object
  StatisticsPkg.Statistics

public class Statistics
extends java.lang.Object

Class used to obtain statistics of individual players, pairs of players, and top players.

Since:
2013-11-08
Version:
1.0
Author:
Bruno Boivin

update

public static void update(java.lang.String winner,
                          java.lang.String loser)
Updates statistics of a specified pair of players. It updates their respective player records and the corresponding pair record.

Parameters:
winner - username of player who won
loser - username of player who lost
